import React from 'react' import NewCategoryForm from './NewCategoryForm' import NewGoalForm from './NewGoalForm' import { useState } from 'react' import { Link} from 'react-router-dom'; export default function DashBoard(props) { const [goals, setGoals] = useState([]) const addGoal = (goal) => { setGoals([goal]) } console.log(props.userInfo.categories) // console.log(goals) return (

Dashboard

Preferences

Hello {props.userInfo.name} remember "{props.userInfo.quote}"

{props.userInfo.categories.map((category, index) => (

{category.name} Duration {category.duration}

))}
) }
